news_header: Vice President J.D. Vance met with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy and German leaders, including the head of the far-right AfD party, during the Munich Security Conference.
news_original_title: Vance lectures European allies on democracy at security summit in Munich
news_text: Vance criticized America's European allies and expressed support for right-wing parties. He emphasized the need for European leaders to address their voters' concerns. Despite mixed messages from the U.S. regarding Ukraine, Vance later endorsed Europe's stance on increasing sanctions against Russia and deploying U.S. troops in Ukraine. European leaders expressed confusion over U.S. policies and doubts about achieving peace with Putin.
